post.body: I'm in town 1 more day, will try to come by for lunch Tues if I can get my office buds to join me. What is your fav lunch?
too bad. Wud b nice to no how/if each vrble (or combo of comptng vrbls) ffctd vlntrs. How else do we no WHY we do what we do?
Burger's site, http://bit.ly/FYxb, has a link to the study, but link is not working now
I wndr if Burger idntifd how ech varibl ffectd vlnteer: role of authrty, incrmntl chng, physcl setng, disngagd rspnsblty
not just Morocco but also Moroccons in Europe, http://bit.ly/ZnGH
if you go, tell the manager that social media is now respoonsible for bringing him a new customer!
ha ha, no, not at the News Stand. I think it was the Grafton St Bar & Grill, http://bit.ly/DcMF
I never visited before it was commercial , but I did like my visit there, had the best scallops I have ever had
of course! I'll be looking for a steak, haven't had one in a long time
I heard the News Stand in Harvard Square is closing. Is this true? Have you been by there lately?
A friend had free lunch coupons to another restrnt today, so I'll come by Blue Water Grill after the holidays.
Oh, I never doubted :)
true. no doubt I have missed some opportunities. 6 yrs in Army taught me 2 be mor decisive, very valuable lesson, balance = key
Great vid. I just hope some of his sarcasm doesn't derail student's comprehension of his real message. Gosh u have a hard job.
RT @jilliancyork: My social media hope 4 '09: Tht peple wil stop talkin abt social media so godamn much & jst use it! U can't all b exprts.

my site is still down. Agghh!! Hope to be up by Monday.

damn! my website is down, but will be back up shortly.
